root.name: Nobunyaga no Yabou
root.description: OverviewNobunyaga no Yabou, or Nobunyaga's Ambition, is a browser-based social game produced by Tecmo Koei as a cuter incarnation of the traditionally more serious Nobunaga's Ambition series. It launched on Yahoo Japan's Yahoo Mobage game service on February 22, 2011. Like the primary Nobunaga's Ambition series, Nobunyaga no Yabou features many historical figures from Japan's Warring States era, with the added twist of recasting them all as cats.
